Veratis watched in amazement as Shadow Wing sat up. he thought for a 
moment "She shouldn't be able to do this without a true form." 
Somehow Shadow Wings mntal capacities were growing stronger. She was 
communicating with the scanner, she was moving the Protoform what 
next telekinetic powers? Veratis noticed the DNA sequencers go online 
scanning for compatible material, they were searching long range now, 
the rejected DNA was somehow being altered to fit the bots needs it 
would take some time to adapt he could only hope that Lunarpine would 
return on time.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She tried again to raise the protoform up.  It took a lot of effort 
> and energy, but she finally got the form to sit up again.  She 
tried 
> to connect to the optics of the bot, to try to see.  The optics on 
> the form flickered as she tried, but then they went dark.  She 
> couldn't find the right connection.  She didn't want to give up 
> though.  She had the bot sitting upright on the table.  She tried 
to 
> move the legs, but it was proving to difficult to do too much at 
> once.  She didn't feel like she was apart of this form.  More like 
> just at the controls, but not inside it like her old form.   She 
> stopped and just fucused on the bot sitting up.  It stayed in the 
> possision.  She typed up on the screen for Veratis to read,"Hey, I 
> think I'm getting the hang of it now."
